title: Color blind problem
body: In game the background is green with yellow and other light colors, but now so is the mouse cursor. Tried color blind mode but that doesn't help at all. There should be a way to change the color of the cursor so us people who have a hard time with colors could see it better. Every time in game I always lose the mouse cursor because my eyes have a hard time distinguishing between them.

replies.body: Hmm, have you tried fiddling around with color in your computer screen settings, or increasing the hud size/ decreasing the resolution for a bigger hud, but smaller view area, I mean I'm not colorblind, but it does blow when they don't have all the right color blind option, just the generic one instead of your specific rare off 1.
Yea I pretty much have tried everything, if only they had an option to make the cursor different colors and size it would make a big difference for people like me who have vision problems.

Ayy just pryed up some info I got from a topic about small sized cursors, anyway
